ygData.subject: Re: Re: Re: Grrrrrrrr!
ygData.msgSnippet: Even on the Tribunal, the second newest server until yesterday, it s a lot of work to sell medium bronze now for 2pp/AC. I had a bunch in my bank I ended up
ygData.messageBody:
Even on the Tribunal, the second newest server until yesterday, it's a
lot of work to sell medium bronze now for 2pp/AC.

I had a bunch in my bank I ended up selling for 1.5pp/AC to a guy
because I was tired of hanging around trying to auction it. From now on
it goes straight to a vendor, because it's too much hassle to sell.

On Wed, Dec 22/99, Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...> wrote:
> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
> > "WTB: Banded Armor will pay lots"
> > - and sadly this last guy gets no answers
>
> Well, when it's a L35 shaman shouting for the banded, you wonder
> who's been doing a bit of questing recently. ;)
>
> That's all banded seems to be used for now-a-days.
>
> Harmonic.
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
>
